products.note: Please visit absa.co.za to see all our products and fees.

featurePoints: •	Sole Proprietors with an annual turnover of up to R5 million
•	Business Visa DebitCard/s
•	24/7 access to Absa Online and the Banking App

•	Cashflow Manager:
A cloud based accounting system to assist you with running your business
•	Tiered pricing on electronic transactions
•	Zero fees on Absa interaccount transfers
•	Zero fees on Absa-to-Absa (internal) debit orders
•	Access to cash handling
•	Shari'ah-compliant investment options available if required

featurePoints: •	Any registered business entity with an annual turnover of up to R500 million.
•	Business Visa DebitCard/s
•	24/7 access to Absa Online and the Banking App

•	Cashflow Manager:
A cloud based accounting system to assist you with running your business
•	Tiered pricing on electronic transactions
•	Zero fees on Absa interaccount transfers
•	Zero fees on Absa-to-Absa (internal) debit orders
•	Access to cash handling
•	Shari'ah-compliant investment options available if required

products.note: Please visit absa.co.za to see all our products and fees.

featurePoints: •	Any registered business entity with an annual turnover of up to R500 million.
•	Business Visa Debit Card/s
•	24/7 access to Absa Online and the Banking App

•	Cashflow Manager:
A cloud based accounting system to assist you with running your business
•	35 free electronic transactions (digital payments, external debit orders, POS transactions)
•	10 cash deposit or withdrawal transactions capped at R50 000 per month at any Absa ATM
•	Unlimited Absa interaccount transfers
•	Unlimited Absa-to-Absa (internal) debit orders
•	Shari'ah-compliant investment options available if required

•	15 cash deposit or withdawal transactions capped at R100 000 per month at any Absa ATM
•	Unlimited Absa interaccount transfers
•	Unlimited Absa-to-Absa (internal) debit orders
•	Shari'ah-compliant investment options available if required
